content.detailedDescription:
I was taking out the garbage, about 10:30 pm, atlantic time, on the 23rd of january, 2007. it was a cold, clear night, with cloudless sky in my neighbourhood, 73 micmac drive, hammonds plains, nova scotia, canada. (my wife and i live in an area that is on the flight path to the halifax international airport from the western approach and see many commercial flights throughout the day and night pass overhead).I was halfway down our driveway when i just happened to look up and over towards the western sky. much to my amazement i was looking up at a large black triangle about the size of a 747. i didn't get excited but acted as though it was an everyday occurance, nothing out of the ordinary. but it was out of the ordinary since it was a large, black, equilateral triangle flying over my street at low level altitude. the triangle shape was clearly defined. at the underside of each of the three angles  was one bright white light and at the center of the underside of the craft was a red dome. it must have been a few hundred feet in the air but the craft was well defined as i said above. i thought to myself way cool man...So what the hell is that. at about the same time, coming in from the southwest was a 757; the pilots had to have seen the triangle. well anyway i went about my business and went back to the house to get a few more items that i was putting out to the side of the road for pickup in the morning; the triangular craft was still around when i got out to the street but was moving slowly in a north easterly direction as if following the street lights on micmac drive, the street where we live. the craft was not silent, but did not make the same sound that other aircraft make as they pass overhead. it was sort of like the sound our furnace makes as it exhausts up the chimney.
here is the real kicker that gets to me; we have a digital camera and because i was not used to using the thing it didn't cross my mind until later that night that i could have taken some great pics of that thing. i could have followed it down the street in lots of time to get some great shots, it was moving so slow, but i didn't.
content.summary: Black triangle cruised overhead rather slowly from a west-south westerly direction, turned and followed my street in a north easterly direction.

content.detailedDescription: As i was letting the dog out into the backyard, i noticed a very bright light somewhat low in the western sky, and just a little to the north. at first i thought it to be an incoming aircraft, but it moved so very slowly as other aircraft came and went. it was brighter and much larger than any star in the sky. so my next guess was that it might be venus, but it was much larger and definitely moving. i called a friend to verify that it was really there and that i wasn't imagining things. it slowly moved upward above the tree line, then to the right, then to the left, down, back to the right, then up again until it began to fade up into the sky - not down as it would have if it were simply going farther over the horizon or over the mountains. this object remained visible for exactly one hour until it moved upward and faded out.
content.summary: Very slow moving bright light

content.detailedDescription: This object appeared in the western sky where the planet venus would have been, but venus was already below the horizon.  this object was very bright upon initial sighting about 9:05 pm  and it moved towards the north slightly, by 925pm it had droppped closer to the horizon but had lost half of it's brillance, it appeared to be moving away. it passed over a streetlight at the 12 o'clock position and moved down to a 5 o'clock position from the streetlight when it moved back up to almost a 3 o'clock position from the streetlight. by 940pm it dropped down until it appeared to go below the horizon. during this entire event, the object seemed to be changing colors from a red to an orange to yellow and even light green and blue.
content.summary: This "planet" moves on it's own.

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 4:00 in afternoon my son and i looked up from my semi-remote cabin area to see around 35 to 37 triangular or boomerang shapes moving from the southwest to the northeast in a direction towards kingman, arizona. at first we both thought they were large birds, but there was absolutely no wing movements nor directional or altitude variances typical of soaring birds. and because they had wingspans that we had estimated to be "at least" anywhere from ten to fiften feet in length, we ruled out any known birds of that size that could soar motionless in a straight line at an angle accross the prevailing winds. there was no pattern to their flight,like a v-shape for example, but rather random 'bunching' and a couple stragglers. because we witnessed them for a period of a few minutes in which they traveled about five miles in distance, we both had time to grab binocculars and a rifle with a scope to observe them closer. neither of us could distinguish typical bird-like heads or tails or feet. the entire time we saw them there was no movement of the wings, no sound and they all kept uniform distances from each other and altitude did not change. altitude was very hard to estimate, but we thought perhaps 1500 to 2000 feet, and about a quarter mile distant from us at the closest point. it looked like to me while observing through binocculars that the tips of the wings were greyish in color whiile the main body was black. the l9cation of the sighting was one mile west of hiway 93 between mile markers 100 and 102...I know this from knowing the location of my land parcel in relation to the hiway and the direction of the flight of the unknowns. we lost sight of them as they got to small to see above the horizon, they were still moving in a straight line in the general direction of kingman. the weather conditions were very clear under high, scattered clouds. there was 8-10 mph winds from the southwest.

at the time of the event we had just completed some target shooting and relaxing around the cabin area. we noticed the event because i had happened to look up and see them approaching us from the direction of the aquarius mountains accross from hiway 93, and immediately i alerted my son to them. we both later and immediately discussed the sighting and had similar feelings that it was almost surreal in that "if" they were very large birds (and hard to determine exact altitude or size) they moved in a continuous straight line and did not change altitude, which convinced us they were more mechanical than biological in nature.
content.summary: 35 to 37 dark triangular or boomerang shapes moving appx. southesat to northwest direction.

content.detailedDescription:
Dear mufon,
i have written to you before regarding a ufo a saw last year in a plane i am now writing to ou now about something different.I am not sure of the exact date when i saw this ufo/uso,but i am sure of the time.
before i saw the object i was being driven to school by my dad.We were talking and driveing down a hill that leads to a street right next to the ocean.As we were driveing a security car pulled next to us and speeded in front of our car.The security car was from marymount college witch we had just passed.We then made a turn and saw the ocean as we began our way down what the locals call the switchbacks(a very winding road).On the side of the road the security car pulled over and looked out to the ocean,by the way the dya was very windy,and we are right across from the island santa catilina.I then looked towards the direction he was and saw many white caps along with multiple cargo ships.The ocean disapered as we amde a turn then reapered,and there it was.It was a white object,as big or bigger than the cargo ships,and moving very fast.At first i thought it was a white cap,but it was kepping form and just to large to be a white cap becuase a wave that big just wouldnt hold and move like that.Its movement was unpredictable going this way and that.It kept vanishing though as we would lose sight of it,when we go behind a tree or something.We saw for the last time and my dad,a total skeptic,looked at my and said what the hell was that.That for me was liike a nial in the the coffin that it wasnt ordinary.Reason being that my dad had lived his childhood near the caspian sea and had spent his early years seeing white caps every day.
we got to the bottom of the hill and never saw it aian.




the object

i described it as best as possible but in detail it almost was like a mussel that you like eat,but white and pushed down kinda flat.




ryan
content.summary: Shell like,white,almost see thruogh,fast

content.detailedDescription:
My wife was driving our 2006 ml500 i was in the front seat, my infant son in back. as we were on our way to a childs birthday party i wasn't suprised to see what i thought was a ballon floating over the neiborhood of talega. then i thought no it's to big and i pointed it out to my wife saying half jokingly "oh look theres a ufo" and just as i said that it stopped moving higher and began to fall slowly at fist and the very quickly and as it moved down it began to look more like a boomerang than a ballon. then it looked like it stopped falling but just dissapeared. i told my wife to stop but she said she couldn't because there was someone behind us,and thats it, i scanned the clear blue sky the rest of the afternoon but never saw it again.
this is the third ufo i think i've seen but the first one i ever reported.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I thuoght it was a balloon at first but then it started to change direction and shape

content.detailedDescription: We were watching the sky through our telescope when we decided to take a break and just look around.We looked at the south eastern part of the sky and then we saw it. a bright object was moving ass the sky. at first we thought it was a star until it moved. it moved in zigzag formation. we just stared at it. we did not move. then it just disappeared. after we saw it we screamed.
content.summary: Bright object that was moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Was  with a friend walkin the dog by langnes airfield, it was  a clear sky, no moon , no wind, was lookin for satelites nd shooting stars when we saw an eggshaped object cruising by in about 200 mph. it looked like brushed aluminium , no sound nd no light came from it. it was between 100-200 feet away nd about 3-6 feet in diameter.. the object flew in a straight line and not  more thn 60 feet up in the air, it disapered after about 5 sec. we was stunned  of wat we had seen, it wasnt like anything we had seen before
content.summary: Eggshaped orb

content.detailedDescription:
My father and i had gotten up at 2a.M. in our home in mammoth lakes ca. to go on a goose hunting trip with a friend of his, we were on the road with his friend by 3 a.M. and headed north on hwy 395. we were passing by mono lake (it takes about 40 minutes to get from mammoth lakes to lee vining). i looked up throught the windshield and saw a large white glowing sphere with a much smaller white glowing sphere moving in unison across the sky. i pointed and said what is that? my father and friend both looked up and we pulled over by the lake and got out of the truck.  we watched it move across the sky from west to east over the lake and then it came back over the center of the lake and moved down just above the surface of the lake almost setting the whole lake aglow.  we stared in amazement and then it came across the lake directly towards us and stopped just off shore, then shot straight up into the sky and vanished with incredible speed.  not a sound at all.  we stood there a moment then got back into the truck and my father said, i never believed in ufo's before but i sure do now!  we pulled back onto the hwy and down the road.  then i noticed that it was no longer night time and that the sun was out.  i said to my dad, what time is it?  he looked at his watch 3 times and said, it's 7 a.M.  my dad just said, we're late and we all sat in silence for a long time.
that's the best i can remember for so many years ago.  all my life i have wondered what happened to the time.  aprox. 3 hrs. missing.  i have no idea what happened other than we arrived about 3 hrs. late to our destination.  i don't know if it's been to long to get any of my questions answered, but i would really like to know what happened that early morning so long ago. can you help me?
sincerely
philip c. stockwell jr.
96465 coverdell rd. 28
brookings, or. 97415
541 412 8291
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: We saw it in the sky over mono lake ca. two sphere's, one small the other large, they came down over the lake and hovered a moment then came towards us and hovered very close then shot up into the sky and vanished, aprox. 3 hrs had vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I went to corona heights with my six by thrity millimeter bonoculars to view to newly opened pack bell park baseball stadium. i was on corona heights looking to the east at the lights of the new pack bell baseball park. i looked up at about a seventy or eighty degree angle above the ball park towards the east and suddenly i spotted a rectangular box shaped object much like the shape of the one i saw in 1995 in san francisco on september 16, 1995 at 2:11 p.M. it was very small and high and moving fast; maybe as much as five hundred miles per hour since i only observed it for ten seconds while it flew in a straight line directly east. it became to small and far away for me to see after ten seconds as it flew over the san francisco bay and beyond the distant berkeley hills. it had no lights and i suspect that it's dull brown color was the result of only the glow of the city lights illunimating the object so i could see it. it was about one seventh the diameter of the full moon or smaller but i could clearly see it was a retangular box shaped object. it flew very near by the right side of the ball park but not direclty over the ball park. i doubt anyone could have seen it without bonoculars as it would be too faint in brightness and small for the naked eye to notice on a dark night. maybe the et's like baseball? it was a clear night and the visiblity was good.
content.summary: Small brown colored rectangular box shaped object moving at high velocity in the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
We had been driving overnight, (my brother james and i) headed to roxby downs. it was a really clear night and pitch black, with just less then a full moon. james was driving, and i was asleep, when i was jerked awake by him yelling at me and suddenly stopping the car.
he was freaking out and yelling "look, look!" and "what the hell is that, oh my god" and shaking me, ordering me to look at the north-eastern sky.

i did, and there was several arrangements of lights in the sky.
three lights on each in triangle formation, the lights themselves elliptical.
i was fully awake now and we were both staring in shocked silence and horror.
were they really ufo's, i asked myself?
my brother and i believe in such things, and immediately searched for any sign that they were an identifyable aircraft.

as they flew closer to the moon, sillhouettes in the moonlight, we could see that they were shaped a bit like a teardrop.

they were flying fast and high at first, but nearing us they slowed their pace, hovering slightly lower, terrifying us.

then our car died, and my phone went dead.
we were horrified.

filled with horror, shock, excitment, panic, and confusion at what we were seeing, we talked to eachother about what we were seeing, never taking our eyes of the three crafts.

dissapearing to north-western skies, we watched the lights fade from vision in a ghostly fasion.

shocked still we sat in the car talking about the event, trying to make sense of it untill the car and my phone came back to life about half an hour later.

the experience would have only been 45 minutes, an hour at most, but our car clock read 7:07, 4 hours and 13 minutes from the time my brother first sighted the lights.
content.summary: My brother and i were driving to roxby downs, and we had been driving through the night and we saw several lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
The year was 1979 or 1980, but i remember it was a day we had a solar eclipse. i was studying as a boarder in my school, st.Georges homes, ketti, nilgiris dist, tamil nadu, india and i was in the 7th grade, aged about 11 years old. we had only half a day of school that day as it was a solar eclipse and the kids were asked to stay indoors in our dormitories. that evening after the eclipse, at around 6.30 pm or 7.00pm all the school kids assembled outside the dining hall as usual waiting for dinner. it was when we noticed, i think the whole school saw it, two glowing stationary spheres about 1/3 the size of a full moon, both were of the same size and same colour, ie. the same as a glowing bulb. there was no audiable noise. the moon was also visible seperately, we did check that, but dont remember in which direction, but it was clearly visible.The sky was clear and no clouds, however, to the left of the two spheres was something that looked very odd...A very bright orange coloured cloud or object, again stationary shaped exactly like a comma, didnt figure out if it was a cloud reflecting sunlight or an object that was glowing on its own...We watched these objects for over an hour, till we went in for dinner.The whole time we watched all three objects, the two spheres and the comma shaped cloud/object, didnt move or change size or shape. when we returned after dinner, the sky was dark and none of the objects were visible. no photographs of the objects were taken, however i d remember two or three school teachers also watched the spectacle. i dont remember anyone discussing the matter again.

a year later, in 1980 or 81, i was in my 8th grade,and in the same school, two friends and i were again witness to another very very creepy ufo incident, ufo, i insist because what we saw this time really did fly and move. this incident is so unbelievable, that if i mention the details here, you wouldnt take the report i mentioned above seriously...So i hope to post it at a later date. one of the witnesses to the second incident is still in touch with me and we did discuss the incident after a gap of nearly 24 years just to confirm what i had seen wasnt a dream or hallucination.
content.summary: Two glowing and stationary obejects approximately 1/3 the size of full moon

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving a resturant in guntersville al. upon walking to the car i noticed a large object in the air and told my fiance "look at that big plane". then i slowly realized it was not a plane,it was moving too slow to be a plane that large and it was totally silent. one of the 1st things that i recognized was not like a plane was the lights. i see planes all the time and they have a red light on one end and a green on the other that flash in turns one at a time. this craft was nothing like that. there were 4 or 5 solid orange lights from the nose straight down the belly of the craft,one more solid orange light near the center and a bright red/orange light at the middle rear on the bottom. i could see white light flashing at the rear on both corners. these lights flashed at the same time. as the craft flew over me and was going away from me, the white lights were much brighter from the rear and the orange/red light at the center of the rear was only visible inbetween the flashes of the brighter white lights. we headed home and i was sitting in the back of the car so i continued watching out the window. we were headed north-east towards scottsboro.The craft was still visible to my right. much farther away now but still hanging around in the same general area. again...Much too slow to be an aircraft. it was in sight off and on as the landscape allowed on the way home.After we got into heavy trees and hills,i could no longer see the sky line and i lost sight of the object. i watched another craft around one month ago over highway 79 in scottsboro.This was the same road we were traveling last night as i watched the craft.The one a month ago was bright orange/red strobing.It hovered and moved left to right and stopped.It slowly moved east over lake guntersville and got brighter and dimmer.I saw 3 planes come towards the object from three different directions.Once they all got about the same distance from the object,the object vanished.I saw the triangle again tonight upon walking into my house.It was heading west but the white lights that i saw last night on the rear were not there.I could see the orange lights on the bottom and the red/orange light on the bottom rear was flashing.It was only in sight for maybe 90 seconds.I ran inside and got my mom out to see the craft for about 10 seconds before it went out of sight.I stayed outside for 5 min's afterwards, but never saw it again.My feelings were not new ones. i had experienced a ufo sightning when i was 13 or 14 years old living on sand mountain(al.) there were a lot of sightings on the news at the time in fyffe alabama.Me and my family watched that object make awesome high speed bursts and then come to a dead stop.It was never close enough to see the shape but the strobing lights and flight path were something that had me looking up at the sky every since.Until a month ago i have never again seen anything that i could say for certain was not a plane.But the object i saw over highway 79 one month ago was very close to what i saw as a teenager. what i saw last night and tonight was the 1st time i have ever seen one close enough to see the shape and detail of the lights.I was not sure if i wanted to report a month ago.I was almost ready to report last night.After i saw it again tonight i thought it was very important that i report this sighting. i am hoping there might be some other reports that will go along with mine for this area in the past month or days.I have waited almost 20 years since my 1st sighting to see another.And now that i have,i find myself reluctant to tell others because of the taunting that i had to endure as a teenager when i was so excited about watching a ufo.But i know what i have seen and i know eye witness accounts are very important to mufon.I so hope you will email me in response to this report.I would like to know if there were other sightings in my area and if the triangle i saw sounds like something others have seen.If possible i am willing to send a drawing of what i saw.Thank you....Jeremy adams
content.summary: Left resturant and noticed large,triangle ship above moving silent and slow

content.detailedDescription: We witnessed a large strange fireball circling in the northern sky of goodyear, arizona at eight in the evening. a total of five people witnessed this strange fireball which also had a long tail. the fireball circled the northern sky about two times. my family and i thought that the strange fireball was possibly an airliner that was on fire. the fireball then disappeared into the northern sky heading east. the fireball could be seen for about five minutes.
content.summary: Fireball over goodyear, arizona

content.detailedDescription: it happened while i was laying in pation in my backyard. fist my attention brought large real airplain.So i watch skyes for some more. i ve noticed flying object with a high speed. fisrt i thought it was a satelite or a private jet. after second same type of object appered but it was flying toward this one.They crossed way of each other and after this about 30 bright silver object appeared. they were silver color and much bigger that those two. i watched it for 30 sec and i ran into tha house to call husband. they dissapeared after 30 sec! too bad i was trying to show it to my husband.
content.summary: two bright round objects crossed each other way after this about 30 bright object appeared. they were silver color. stayed in formation. i watch it for about 30 sec

content.detailedDescription: I was walking in the parking lot of safeway located on the corner of market and church streets. i was heading towards safeway and walking through the parking lot. about halfway through the parking lot i spotted an object with a flashing light coming from the north. i stopped to observe it. as it came closer i could see it shape; first is was too far away to recognize it's shape. it was a bright red colored rectangular box shaped object with it length pointing vertically. it made no sound and had no exhaust i could see. then at it's closes point as it crossed in front of me it was about the appearant size of the full moon. it flashed so brightly that the box was completely covered by the light or my eyes could not see the object during its flash. the light was not random but flashed at a timed interval of three seconds between flashes. the flash appeared to be coming from inside the box from the exact center of the box. between flashes i noticed something silver and shinny in the upper right corner of the box on its very edge which was reflecting sun light with a silver color. it was as if the cube had a silver steel frame under some kind of red material which was covering it but not at that small corner or angle so it relfected silver light instead of red light. the box appeared to be low and small no larger than ten feet in width and maybe about two or three thousand feet high. i doubt it was piloted by living beings since it was too small. it must have been some kind of robot or automated spy craft. it was heading south. at one point it stopped in mid air and hovered for about three seconds. then it went straight up for about one thousand feet and started heading south again until it was so far away i could only see the flashing light. from far away it could easily be mistaken for a plane. the ufo was moving slowly the time i observed it and the time it took to cross the whole sky which was about five minutes. it apeared to be moving slowly accross the sky and was not very high. if i had a range finder that would have helped in my determination of its exact height and size. it was a clear, blue cloudless sky and good visibility.
content.summary: Bright red rectangular box shapped ufo the size of full moon

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my older brother up to the 24 divisdero bus stop and we as we crossed into the middle of beaver street i was looking to the west as saw a moving white luminous sphere heading towards us. it was about the size and brightness of the planet jupiter. we both saw it fly towards us then it crosses in front of us in the north at about 75 degrees above the horizon and above the rooftops on the north side of the street. the it heading towards the north east and disappeared into a small amount of fog which was accross the bay. the object took about a minute in a half to cross the sky. it was very high and it did not appear to be a plane light; the whole object was lighted. i have seen high planes before and they usually have flashing lights or one small light but i doubt it could be a plane. it was not a sattelight because they take at least five minutes to cross the sky. i was to slow to be a meteorite. this was the first luminous of two luminous balls i have seen the other one i have already reported to mufon.
content.summary: Luminous white ball crossed most of the sky and behind clouds in southeast

content.detailedDescription: It was a cloudy day with only high cirrus clouds in the sky with some blue sky comming through. visibility was good below 25,000 feet. i took out my 12-36 power by 70mm zoom bonoculars outside. i stopped on the hill on beaver street about thirty feet from castro and beaver. i pointed my bonoculars at about an eighty degree angle into the sky and immediately spotted a strange gray, triangluar object. it was about half the size of the full moon at 12 power. i zoomed in for a closer look. the object appeared now to be close to the size of the full moon at about 25 power. it was heading south at high velocity, maybe several hundred miles and hour. it made several three hundred and sixty degree rolls so i could see what it looked like on the top. it had a red stripe going straight down the top from point to back. i noticed it was very flat, too flat to have a pilot. the sun reflected off its shinny gray bottom. at about close to two minutes of observation, the object went behind the roofs of the building accross the street. it was heading south all the way. my best guess as to the size of the object was no larger than fifteen feet in diameter. i don't think it was very large and was low in our atmosphere maybe only one or two miles up. it made no sound at all. i am an avaition fan and this object did not resemble any man made automated craft including the new small propeller unpiloted craft as seen in the latest issue of popular mechanics or any of the unpiloted, automated stealth jet spy craft which all have wings or anything like any of our stealth bombers. it also did not resemble the flying wing from the 1950's. it clearly was flat and without any wings but it did have rounded edges and one could say that it was aerodynamic by they way it flew. it flew like it was a air show craft doing rolls and a few sharp turns but still heading in a southward direction. it could see the flatness object when it did some rolls and when it was south from me. it could see the flat back of the object. when i first sighted it, the ufo was in the east towards the s.F. bay at an eighty degree angle overhead and heading south. it wished i had with me a zoom digital video recorder as it would have made an excellent film.
content.summary: Flat, triangular shapped ufo with red stipe on top and shinny, gray bottom

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were in our bedroom talking before we left for work in the morning (we were dressed and had been awake for 1/2 hour or more). we both happened to be looking out our large bedroom window at the same time. this window faces west. out of this window we can see a patch of sky and saw an oval-shaped ball of orange light streak past, going very fast. it was heading south. we both were startled by it. i got up and went up to the window, and approximately 15-20 seconds later i saw it again, going northwest, but it made an arc towards the northeast before it disappeared from view (behind houses and trees in the foreground). it could have been reflecting the sunrise (though it was partly overcast and the sun was not very bright this morning), but as it turned the glare never changed. it seemed to stay a uniform "ball of bright light." we never saw any lights on it, or and part of any structure that would indicate a helicopter tail, or airplane wings. it was devoid of any detail, although we were seeing it from quite a distance away. this thing struck both of us as being very unusual. we both agreed it looked egg-shaped and it was so, so bright. it left no trail. when i saw it make the arc, the movement did not seem to resemble a helicopter or anything i had seen before. i can't stop thinking about it. i can take a photo of the window and create a simulation in photoshop that i can submit later. thank you for listening.
content.summary: Saw orange ball of light move in two directions past bedroom window

content.detailedDescription:
Please call me.
i've been trying again and again to send you the pictures .No way.
something's not working with the attachment section....
they were two far away objects high in the sky with weird behaviour. i first thought they were birds of prey. then i realized they could not be birds or planes as they don't come in  round black "donut" shapes...Or was it red triangles?
they seemed to be shifting shapes!
i rushed into the house to grab my camera and my roommate.
we stepped outside and saw...A red and black donut shaped "whatizit" and an arrow shaped one.
 i would like to think they were balloons, but they really looked weird.
the second object ( i mean the one that was following the other) turned bright and disappeared into a cloud in a flash !! ??
that was far from us and we could not believe our eyes.
on the pictures they really look like saucers!!!
someone else than us must have seen those. this was right over hollywood in the middle of a sunny afternoon,on  feb 28 2007. 2 witnesses here...
content.summary: Two saucer shaped object hovering and drifting east over hollywood.

content.detailedDescription:
While conducting law enforcement operations, myself and 2 partners observed a very bright "star" to the south of our location.  we commented that it must be one of the planets that are sometimes very visible.  as we conducted our business, we continued to glance at the "star" that was hanging in the sky.  there was no movement to this object.  we then suddenly noticed that the bright star was not there anymore, replaced with red and green lights.  this object then moved slowly towards our location at an altitude of about 3,000 feet agl.  we heard no sounds associated with an aircraft, i.E. helicopter, fixed wing, jet, etc.  the object passed over our location silently.  it had a myriad of red and green lights underneath it, and you could make out that it was a elongated triangle shape.  note that we were in a very rural location, conducting undercover operations.  it was very quiet, and this craft made absolutely no noise whatsoever.  it continued northbound over the laton area, which borders kings/fresno counties.
note that lemoore naval air station is located in kings county, and would have been located southwest of this sighting.  definitively i can state that this was not a fixed wing/motorized plane, nor a rotary wing, nor a jet.  it was silent at 3000 ft/agl.
interesting to say the least.
content.summary: Elongated triangle shape, zero noise emission

content.detailedDescription: it was very windy when i let my dog out to do her business at 5:24 a.M i know the time because the microwave is right by the side door to our kitchen. it was a mix of high clouds & swirling winds with a storm brewing to the west. i stared into the nnw sky over 3/4 of the way up there were a series of lights spaced well apart moving at the exact same speed as the others. there were 6 of them total. i seen the one & it was dead silent except for the wind occasasionally gusting. i first thought it was a distant star until i followed it & it was moving. i noticed through the breaks of clouds that there were others not too far way. obviously no set pattern, but they all moved at exactly the same speed.It would not have helped to have my camera as they were too far away to get a good shot. the clouds moved in a few minutes in to my tracking & it was over. i wish i could have gotten my telescope out of the garage to get a better view, but time was not on my side. then i tried to get back to bed. knowing that what i just saw was inexplicable. but i know what i saw.   sincerely, mark simon
content.summary: Several lights at high altitude fling in a steady formation north to south

content.detailedDescription:
3/17/2007
2:45pm mountain

while in my sunroom which faces east, i looked up out the window and saw an object nearly straight above me. thinking it is a weather balloon like i have seen before i got out my binoculars to get a better look. i couldn���t get a real good view of it so i went outside. i was able to get a better look and saw a triangular object, it was metallic in color and each corner of the object was dark. i heard no noise coming from it, yet i could here the engines of passenger jets as they passed overhead shortly thereafter. i could not determine the altitude because it was overhead with nothing to reference it against. i watched the object for a couple of minutes and then went into the house to get a more powerful set of binoculars, i was gone for less than a minute and the object was gone. i scanned the skies and could not relocate it.
content.summary: Triangular, metalic, with dark rounded corners,

content.detailedDescription: I was up early for work reasons just around 5:30 am. i was in my kitchen but had not turned on any lights yet. i was looking out the window and admiring a dark but clear morning with many stars and jupiter plainly visible. my view was of the southern sky over san francisco and the penninsula. i noticed a couple of jet airlines passing overhead and heard them faintly.  still looking i noticed five or six smaller lights moving quickly from east to west in the same area of sky.  they moved in somewhat of a formation, that is they all seemed to be moving at the same speed but some of them changed position as they went and at such a speed that it almost looked like "dancing lights".  i know of no aircraft that could so easily change position at such a high rate of speed.  i heard no noise from them and after they passed my positon i ran to the front of my house to see if i could continue to watch them but the bright street lights blotted out anything i might have been able to see.  the whole episode took approx 10 seconds.
content.summary: High speed lights in the southen sky

content.detailedDescription:
At 11:21 am i walked into the front yard and my attention was directed to a dc10 (engines on rear of aircraft) that was very low and probably just taken off from knoxville airport. this aircraft was headed east. far above it were two objects. one was clearly a commercial aircraft, leaving contrails and i could clearly see the wings. a few thousand feet below that, not leaving any contrail, was another object, cylinderical in shape, with no visible wings. the lower object (from my point of view) paced the commercial aircraft. i watch both until the cylinderical object was no long visible and the commerical aircraft was just a point of light. 

cylinderical object was the size of a cigarette butt held at arms lenght.
commercial aircraft was about half that size.
it made no turns at all. i kept wishing it would do something goofy 
but it continued pacing the commercial aircraft until out of sight.
content.summary: Cylinder crossed my line of sight moving east to west, pacing commercial aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
(note: i had far too many photos to upload to this so please use the photobucket links for the cropped images, and the sendspace zip link for the full sized pictures. i hope it's not too much of a hassle.) also, the time stated in the form is of my main (orange ball) sighting. the other pictures are taken from various times that day. they are also in chronological order in the zip.


i don't know how to go about this matter but i will try.

so anyhow, i was at my fathers house for the weekend. there was an abnormal amount of contrails in the area and i felt compelled to use my camera for the first time in several months so i decided to take pictures of the trails and the scenery at my house. i will get back to that later. 

my main sighting took place at around 5 or so in the afternoon. my father had asked me to go and get firewood from the barn and i reluctantly agreed. i was lagging behind a bit and by the time i left the house he was already inside the barn gathering wood. 

when i was almost off of my deck i heard the ever so familiar sound of a helicopter flying by and since i'm an avid fan of aviation i stopped and looked for the source of the sound. there was something quite odd about this sound, almost as if it were hollow, like a recording. i didn't pay much attention to this fact until i saw what the sound was coming from.

the sound was coming from a amber/orange ball type ufo that was moving at roughly the same speed as a slow moving helicopter (but it definitely wasn't a helicopter).

i immediately dropped the wood carrier that i had in my hands and bolted inside the house to get my 4 megapixel digital camera. after scrambling around for it and putting new batteries inside i managed to get 3 pictures of the craft before it went behind the trees/hills. i would've gotten more, but unfortunately it was impossible to see it in the viewfinder since it was displayed as white instead of orange.

the weekend had passed and i was quite proud of what i managed to take a picture of. little did i know is that several of the other photographs had ufos in them also. the strange thing about these other photos is that i never saw, nor heard anything. and im 100% sure none of them are birds as it was a fairly barren day bird wise. this may not be related, but there was also a fairly odd x shaped contrail barely above the horizon (which would probably result in a jet slamming into the ground if it tried to make it).

anyhow, enough of that. here are some fullsized, unaltered photos. note, i had to put them in a zip file and upload them to a website because all the image websites would resize the images. rest assured that there's nothing malicious in this file.

http://www.Sendspace.Com/file/grv9b0

anyhow, as i said before the image websites resize my images so here are some cropped versions of the ufos. you should be able to find them easily using the pictures in the zip.

the following pictures are displayed in the same order as the zip (and order of photos taken) for easy finding. also, i never saw any of these while taking the photos except for the one i described in the beginning of course. although i did inexplicably have ufos on the brain that day.

http://i26.Photobucket.Com/albums/c141/thisisforoddwebsiteok/thing1.Png
http://i26.Photobucket.Com/albums/c141/thisisforoddwebsiteok/thing2.Png
http://i26.Photobucket.Com/albums/c141/thisisforoddwebsiteok/thing3.Png
http://i26.Photobucket.Com/albums/c141/thisisforoddwebsiteok/thing4.Png
http://i26.Photobucket.Com/albums/c141/thisisforoddwebsiteok/thing5.Png
http://i26.Photobucket.Com/albums/c141/thisisforoddwebsiteok/thing6.Png
http://i26.Photobucket.Com/albums/c141/thisisforoddwebsiteok/thing7.Png

x-contrail:
http://i26.Photobucket.Com/albums/c141/thisisforoddwebsiteok/thing8xtrail.Png

main sighting (pictures in order):
http://i26.Photobucket.Com/albums/c141/thisisforoddwebsiteok/thing9.Png
http://i26.Photobucket.Com/albums/c141/thisisforoddwebsiteok/thing10.Png
http://i26.Photobucket.Com/albums/c141/thisisforoddwebsiteok/thing11.Png

final picture of a formation:
http://i26.Photobucket.Com/albums/c141/thisisforoddwebsiteok/thing12.Png

in closure, i am 100% positive that the main sighting, and the ones that snuck into my pictures are not birds, aircraft, or lens dirt. i have photographed many birds and airplanes and none of them look like this.

what i'm curious about though, is why the amber orb sounded like a helicopter (albiet hollow)? do they have the technology to disguise their craft as one of our own? maybe there was some sort of error during the process which is why i was lucky enough to see their craft.

thanks for your time. also, if for some reason you need to contact me, use my email as i'm not to comfortable with putting my phone number up.
content.summary: Visually saw orange sphere. took photos. took many other photos that day and ufos appeared in the photos.

content.detailedDescription:
Extraterrestrial experience.

good evening,

i would like to tell about my extraterrestrial experience in brief words:

one night, when i was sleeping, a "machine" settled on the right side of my head and almost hypnotized me to insert a device through my right ear. i called this artifact the "mini-machine in my brain." since then, i have suffered uncountable bad experiences because the "mini-machine in my brain" controls all my body from my brain.

definitely, it is not about an illness of the mind or of the nervous system, but about a phenomenon that i can not explain since i do not remember seen an ufo. probably, now, instead of coming inside ufos, the extraterrestrials send mini-robots to accomplish their missions.

why have i been captured? what should i do to get back my freedom? are there any other cases like mine's?

if you need more information about it i can provide it. thank you very much for your interest and best regards,

luis villegas.
spvh_hvps@hotmail.Com
content.summary: Abduction with mini-machine implant on my brain.

content.detailedDescription: First saw a convoy of them in california,near l.A. on the p.C.H.,think it was april-may 1992.I was driving south-east on the p.C.H. about 20-30 miles out of l.A. proper.Clear day,blue sky, the odd small cloud, early afternoon.Out of the north, so off my left shoulder @ between 10 & 11 o'clock i see maybe a dozen or so of them just hanging there, as i'm driving ~60mph in moderate traffic.All at different elevations, if they were the same size,placed along a narrow,vertical configuration,semi linear.I'm guessing that they were all of the same size, judging by their design.It was impossible to estimate their altitudes ,given my forward motion and the crafts dull white color.The best i can describe them is spherical paddle wheels,two interlocked thin,circular disks,with a + profile,no lights,rotating top paddle to bottom paddle, along the horizontal central axis.All were rotating in phase,at the same angular velocity.Must be some kind of advertisement,i thought.No perceptible wires,no bright colors,no lettering,no lights, no golden arches.I never stopped the truck,i couldn't believe what i'd seen,i was scared shitless,i thought i was nuts,i tried to block it out,i know i'm sane.I want to help your cause.I have extensive research expertise and knowledge.I want to take part in a canadian contribution,be part of your  canadian affiliate.I want to work for you guys.I'm aware of the impact recent and current events are having on your efforts.I'm aware of the demagoguery,hypocrisy,hidden agendas and blatant corruption of which your country suffers,at the highest levels. i have been watching oil +energy politics for the past twenty years and have studied it's history.I'm aware of the current administrations intent and need to maintain the fossil fuel status quo,their climate changing vested interest.They'd have us all driving suv's if they could ,while feeding us lies to scare us into war to maintain  the status quo.
content.summary: Ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting on a screened in back porch fri night the 16th of march. i said, "what is that?" she said, "what"? those light over the city i said. she immediatly got cold bumps all over and said, "o david, what are they?"  i do not know but lets watch. we watched together for about an hour and were fasinated by these strange lights. they would appear one at a time in a straight row, 1st one, then another about a 1000 feet in front of the other. usually three at a time and as many as seven. also they would appear in two's very far apart, as much as 15 miles within seconds. i watched them another half hour. watched the next night, nothing.
content.summary: Saw lights over lake placid for about an hour and a half

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking up in my back yard and saw a slow moving ufo flying directly overhead. skies were clear. wind less than 5mph.  tempurature was 55-60 degrees f. stars were out, sky was exceptionally clear, no clouds no fog.

i could barely discern a outline to the craft - it was either the shape of a triangle or boomerang, i could not make out a tail.  what caught my attention was its speed and altitude. i estimate that it was no more than 800ft above the ground and traveling 50 to 60mph in a straight line.  it passed overhead and over my house, i moved to the front yard to observe it's flight.  i heard no noise until it passed.  i distinctly heard the sound of a jet engine, but the volumne of the its engine was incredibly faint. the time of night this occured flights of jets over my area are rare and can be heard easily even when they fly at commercial jet liner altitudes -25 - 30k feet.  jet planes at 800 feet make a lot of noise and is easily recognizable, this craft made the sound of a jet plane, but the volumne is what you would expect to hear if it was several miles away.  after it passed overhead the engine noise quickly dissapeard.

the lighting on the craft was not like commercial aircraft.  it had what could only be described as cop car rollers on the underside of the craft.  red and white rotating lights as well as fixed position green and blue lights could also be seen.  the action of the lights were exactly like police car lights - up close you could see the beam coming off the the rotating lights.  as the craft continued on its course the lights appeard to strobe like what you see with police car lights.  these sets of lights were arranged in parallel and as the craft moved away, toward buchanan field (east of my location), it looked exactly like a airborne cop car.  

the craft never changed its course or altitude and was visible flying over martinez, pacheco, and parts of concord ca. i could see it clearly for up to fifteen minutes - its flight path looked like it would intersect mount diablo if it continued on the path i observed.  

interestingly, i noticed the craft was exceptionaly stable.  as a former pilot i can easily recognize the change in flight path of a plane that  engages its rudder, alierons or elevator to maintain level flight. this craft seemed to be flying without using areodynamics. thrust + speed + wings = lift.  this craft was not flying like a normal airplane.  

my guess is that this was not extrateresstrial, but rather a new toy for the usaf. the sound of a engine, the look of the lights, the look of it looked terrestrial, the flight behavior of it was anything but.  if i'm right, i'd like to know what how much this thing cost and what our governement intends to use it for.
content.summary: Slow moving ufo lit up like a cop car
